title: Aibuka! (Kari)
description:
Description :
        Ch. 1-6 Aibuka (Club Activities as an Idol)A club is on the verge of shutting down, so what will the club president do to save his club? Of course, create an idol!Ch. 7 You're My IdolShione-chan is his favourite idol. He even went to idols' swimsuit contest which she attended. And while relaxing in bathhouse after that he suddenly sees her entering man bath by mistake. And he takes her up on an offer of having some nude talk together, but how long will he be able to sustain himself.TAGS-MALE: crossdressing, schoolboy uniform, shotacon, sweating-FEMALE: armpit licking, blowjob, defloration, filming, fingering, hairy armpits, handjob, harem, lingerie, lolicon, masturbation, nakadashi, schoolgirl uniform, small breasts, stockings, sweating, teacher, urinationx-ray, yuri-MIXED: ffm threesome, group-OTHER: compilation, story arc, tankoubonNote: There are 2 versions of ch.6, one of 42 pages and one extended, released later in the tankoubon, with 10 more pages (anyway the story is the same, they are only filler pages).

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 7: You're My Idol + Bonus Drawings
